div.head: 金刃傷
div.div: injury inflicted by metal [objects such as a] blade

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: injury inflicted by metal [objects such as a] blade

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with jin chuang 金瘡 , wounds inflicted by metal objects. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 139: 治金刃傷破見骨，中風口噤，豆淋酒方 , “Recipe for a wine made by straining beans to cure injury inflicted by metal [objects, such as a] blade where the [wound is] open and the bones are visible, as well as wind stroke with clenched jaw”.
